title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8107.01 - City of Elmira
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8107.01 - City of Elmira

State Regulations
(a) [Eff. until

Oct. 16, 1996, see also subd. (a) below.] Route 352. Route 352, East Church Street, between Route 17 and

Washington Street. (a) [Eff. Oct. 16, 1996 until Sept. 1, 1999, see also subd. (a) above and below.] Route 352. Route 352
(East Church Street) between Route 17 and Clemens Parkway. (a) [Eff. Sept. 1, 1999, see also subd. (a) above.] Route 352. Route 352
(East Church Street) between Route 17 and Main Street. (b) Judson Street and East Fifth Street
between Church Street and Clemens Parkway. (c) Clemens Parkway. Clemens Parkway between

Pennsylvania Avenue and Grand Central Avenue. (d) East Washington Street between Clemens

Parkway and Lackawanna Avenue. (e) Lackawanna Avenue between East Washington Street and Smith's Transfer
terminal. (f) Washington Street. Washington Street between Route 352, East Church Street, and the Elmira

Psychiatric Center, a distance of 340+- feet. (g) Davis Street. Davis Street between the
northerly City of Elmira city line and Bancroft Road, a distance of 418+-
feet. (h) Bancroft Road. Bancroft

Road between Davis Street and the delivery entrance to the Elmira Correctional

Facility, a distance of 600+- feet. (i) [Eff. until Jan. 17, 1990, see also subd. (i) below.] Pennsylvania Avenue. Pennsylvania Avenue between Clemens Parkway and Sly Street. (i) [Eff. Jan. 17, 1990, see also subd. (i) above.] Pennsylvania Avenue. Pennsylvania Avenue between the southerly City of Elmira city line and Clemens

Center Parkway. (j) Sly Street. Sly

Street between Pennsylvania Avenue and Maple Avenue. (k) Water Street. Water Street between

Clemens Parkway and Madison Avenue in the eastbound direction. (l) Madison Avenue. Madison Avenue (Route 352
northbound) between Water Street and East Church Street. (m) Pennsylvania Avenue. Pennsylvania Avenue
between the southerly city line and Clemens Parkway. (n) Main Street. Main Street between Route
352 (East Church Street) and 1st Street. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8107.01

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
